content: AG-D SP Grinding disc High-performance abrasive grinding disc for fast, rough grinding of stainless/carbon steel (with hub) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to offer the best balance between long lifetime and high removal rate ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – complies with the highest safety standards With hub – for faster disc insertion and replacement Applications Grinding and deburring on steel and stainless steel Weld preparation or cleaning Recommended for fast, rough removal – when quick progress is more important than surface finish ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Product Class: Premium Grain type: Zirconium Technical Data | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Product Class | Premium | Grain type | Zirconium | Blade / disc shape | Type 27 ### ITEMS- 2235215 - Grinding wheel 4.5 x 1/4 x 5/811 SP - Package Size 10 pc
